dimensions:
Warp (plus binding): 61cm (24in.). Weft (plus binding); 55cm (21 5/8in.). Selvedge to selvedge width: 54cm (21 1/4in.)
Pattern: Repeat unit; warp; 17cm (6 5/8in.). weft: 5.3cm (2 1/8in.)                 Ten repeat units fill fabric width.
title: Cover
medium: Technique: Cut loops of supplementary warps in a 3 & 1 twill foundation.
description: Velvet panel bound on four sides with selvedges turned under, by a striped floral patterned silk. The velvet panel vertically symmetrically patterned with men standing and seated in a garden by cut pile in pale yellow and light blue on a voided background showing the foundation.
name: Cover
